s.eng: He who is controlled by Rādhā
the Lord of beauty, the husband of Lakṣmī
He whose face resembles a kunda flower
He who gives pleasure to the cows, gopas, and gopīs

translation.eng: Kṛṣṇa is the beloved of Rādhā, He is controlled by Rādhā, He is the Lord of all beauty, and His face resembles a kunda flower. He is the Lord of the gopīs, He bewilders Cupid, He delights in the rasa of the rāsa-līlā, and revels in amorous play at Rādhā-kuṇḍa’s Anaṅga-sukhada-kuñja. He gives pleasure to the cows, gopas, and gopīs.
